message: File '20250124_PEA App CR_Requirement Spec_MFO.docx' uploaded and analyzed successfully.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-001 ปรับการแสดงผลของงานที่เสร็จแล้วและเป็นงานที่เกินกำหนดให้แสดงรายการที่ด้านล่างของรายการงานทั้งหมด
testchecklist: Verify that the display of completed and overdue tasks is correctly shown at the bottom of the task list.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays completed and overdue tasks.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays completed and overdue tasks.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays completed and overdue tasks in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays completed and overdue tasks with pagination if necessary.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-002 พัฒนาฟังก์ชันสำหรับนำเข้าและปรับปรุงข้อมูล PEANO สำหรับอุปกรณ์ 7 รายการ (งาน Mobile Edit)
testchecklist: Verify that the system correctly imports and updates PEANO data for the 7 specified equipment items.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated PEANO data.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays the imported and updated PEANO data.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated PEANO data in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated PEANO data with pagination if necessary.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-003 สามารถนำเข้าและปรับปรุงข้อมูล Manhole, Handhole ได้
testchecklist: Verify that the system correctly imports and updates Manhole and Handhole data.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated Manhole and Handhole data.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays the imported and updated Manhole and Handhole data.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated Manhole and Handhole data in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated Manhole and Handhole data with pagination if necessary.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-004 ปรับปรุงฟังก์ชันการแสดงผลให้การสำรวจ ที่ภาพแผนที่สามารถแสดงตำแหน่งปัจจุบันได้ (งาน Redlining)
testchecklist: Verify that the system correctly displays the current location on the map during the survey process (Redlining).
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the current location on the map during the survey process.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays the current location on the map during the survey process.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays the current location on the map during the survey process in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the current location on the map during the survey process with pagination if necessary.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-005 พัฒนาฟังก์ชันสำหรับนำเข้าข้อมูลโคมไฟฟ้าสาธารณะ เพื่อสนับสนุนงานลดค่าหน่วยสูญเสียในระบบไฟฟ้า ทางด้าน Non-Technical Loss
testchecklist: Verify that the system correctly imports and updates data for public streetlights to support reducing non-technical losses in the electricity system.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated data for public streetlights.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays the imported and updated data for public streetlights.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated data for public streetlights in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays the imported and updated data for public streetlights with pagination if necessary.

test_checklist.requirement: MFO-006 ปรับปรุงโปรแกรมประยุกต์ให้รองรับการใช้งานด้วย Protocol https
testchecklist: Verify that the system correctly supports and communicates using the HTTPS protocol.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays data using the HTTPS protocol.
Ensure that the system correctly filters and displays data using the HTTPS protocol.
Verify that the system correctly handles and displays data using the HTTPS protocol in the correct order.
Check if the system correctly handles and displays data using the HTTPS protocol with pagination if necessary.
